content.rendered: This Wednesday, November 25, 2021, we had the pleasure and honor to welcome HE Mr. Thierry Mathou, Ambassador of France in Thailand, accompanied by his wife, Mrs. Cécile Mathou, the Consul of France, Mr. Christophe Hemmings, Mrs. Eve Lubin (Head of the cultural department), Mr. Michel-Yves Bernard-Ugen (Head of the security department) and Mr. Lionel de Coninck (Head of the economy department). We thank them warmly for their availability and their attention during the discussions with the students, teachers and parents.
